alert.note: Alert for Haleakala Summit; Kahoolawe; Kipahulu; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Central Valley South; Maui Leeward West; Maui Windward West; South Haleakala; South Maui, Upcountry; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 19 at 2:58AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Kahoolawe and Maui in Maui County through 430 AM HST... At 257 AM HST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles north of Pauwela to 18 miles south of Manele. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kahului, Kihei, Haliimaile, Kipahulu, Keokea, Makawao, Paia, Wailuku, Wailea, Waihee, Pukalani, Kula, Puunene, Pauwela, Waikapu, Waiehu, Makena, Kaupo, Maalaea and Haiku-Pauwela. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
